answers.answer: Hi Martha,Are you on treatment? If you are, the meds are very dehydrating, drink lots and lots of water. I have the same prob too.

Hi Martha,I, too, was so thirsty at the beginning of tx and had sores in my mouth.  I'm not sure if you are on tx or not.  I'm in my ninth week now and don't seem to be as thirsty, but I make sure I drink close to a gallon of water a day.  It has really helped.Good luck,Wilful
If you are not on tx and have excessive thirst, you may want to have your blood glucose checked.  It is a symptom of diabetes.Trinty
